heroTitle: A Sacred Encounter with Ancestral Medicines
heroSubtitle: Discover how Ayahuasca can transform your life, bringing you clarity, emotional healing, and a renewed connection with the universe. Join us in this transformative experience, where tradition meets expert guidance for an unforgettable journey.
exploreMedicineDescription: Learn about Ayahuasca, its origins, effects, and how it can help you in your healing process.
exploreGuidesDescription: Meet the experienced guides who will accompany you on your journey, providing a safe and supportive space.
contactCommunityText: Follow us on our social networks to stay updated on our upcoming ceremonies, events, and news. We are here to answer your questions and accompany you on your path to healing.
footerText: ¬© {{year}} The Art of Healing. All rights reserved.
noUpcomingCeremonies: There are no upcoming ceremonies at this moment.
editCeremonyDescription: Modify the details of the ceremony. Changes will be saved to the database.
addCeremonyDescription: Add the details of the new ceremony. It will be saved to the database.
formFeatured: Feature this ceremony on the homepage
deleteCeremonyConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the ceremony.
mediaRequiredDescription: Please provide a media URL or upload a file.
finishCeremonyConfirmDescription: This will move the ceremony to the 'Past Events' section. Are you sure?
ceremonyMovedToPast: It will now appear in the Past Events section.
guidesPageSubtitle: Experienced professionals dedicated to your healing and transformation process.
deleteGuideConfirmDescription: This action is permanent and cannot be undone.
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is a sacred brew from the Amazon, made from the Chacruna leaf and the Ayahuasca vine. It has been used for centuries by indigenous peoples for healing and spiritual connection.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: The brew induces a modified state of consciousness that allows for deep introspection, emotional release, and spiritual experiences. It helps to confront and heal deep-seated traumas and patterns.
spiritualMasterDescription: Ayahuasca is considered a master plant that teaches, guides, and heals. Each experience is unique and provides what the person needs for their evolution at that moment.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: It helps to dissolve mental confusion, providing a clear vision of your life path and purpose.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: It allows you to access and release repressed emotions and traumas, promoting deep emotional healing.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: Many people report a renewed sense of connection with themselves, others, and the universe.
groupCeremonyDescription: Held in a safe and supportive environment, where the collective energy enhances the individual experience.
privateCeremonyDescription: A more intimate and personalized experience, focused on your specific needs and intentions.
dietSubtitle: A crucial part of the preparation is the 'dieta', which cleanses the body and prepares it for the medicine.
mentalPrepSubtitle: Prepare your mind and spirit to receive the teachings of the medicine with an open heart.
meditationDescription: Practice daily meditation to calm the mind and cultivate a state of presence.
intentionsDescription: Reflect on what you want to heal or understand. Clear intentions guide the experience.
reflectionDescription: Write about your emotions, fears, and hopes before the ceremony to gain clarity.
emotionalHealingDescription: The most important preparation is to come with an open heart, a humble spirit, and a willingness to surrender to the process. Trust the medicine, the guides, and your own inner wisdom. The journey is yours, and you are ready to walk it.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony
whatToBringSubtitle: To ensure your comfort and a focused experience, we suggest bringing the following items:
essentialsList: Change of clothes for the next day
Easy-to-digest fruits or snacks for after
mustBeLoggedInToView: You must be logged in to view this content.
allCeremoniesSubtitle: Explore all our upcoming, past and inactive events.
authRequiredDescription: You need to sign in to perform this action.
fullPlanUpTo: Full plan available up to 4 people
adminPanelSubtitle: Manage your application's content and settings.
themeUpdateReload: The page will now reload to apply the changes.
userManagementSubtitle: View, manage users, and send communications.
allUsersDescription: List of all registered users in the system.
sendEmailDescription: Compose and send an email to all registered users.
questionnaireResponsesDescription: Review the user's answers to the medical and intention questionnaire.
noAnswersSubmitted: No answers have been submitted by this user yet.
errorInvalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
questionnaireDescription: Your safety is our priority. Please answer the following questions honestly. This information is confidential and will only be used by our team to ensure a safe experience.
questionnaireCompletedDescription: Thank you for completing the questionnaire. You can review your answers here. Our team will contact you soon.
questionnaireMedicalConditions: Do you have any significant medical conditions (e.g., heart problems, high blood pressure, diabetes)?
questionnaireMedication: Are you currently taking any medication, including antidepressants or supplements?
questionnaireMedicationDetails: Please list all medications and supplements.
questionnaireMentalHealth: Do you have a history of mental health conditions (e.g., schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, psychosis)?
questionnaireMentalHealthDetails: Please specify your mental health history.
questionnaireExperience: Have you had previous experiences with ayahuasca or other psychoactive substances?
questionnaireExperienceDetails: Please briefly describe your previous experiences.
questionnaireIntention: What is your main intention for participating in this ceremony?
questionnaireSuccessDescription: Your information has been saved successfully.
questionnaireErrorDescription: There was an error saving your answers. Please try again.
dialogSuccessDescription: Your answers have been sent. The next step is to prepare your body and mind for this sacred experience. You can now access our complete preparation guide.
mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to view the questionnaire.
loginSubtext: Enter your credentials to access your account.
googleSuccessDescription: You have successfully signed in with Google.
registerSubtext: Join our community to start your healing journey.
registerSuccessDescription: A verification email has been sent. Please check your inbox.
emailUpdatedSuccessDesc: Your email has been updated successfully. You may need to log in again.
enterPasswordToConfirm: Please enter your current password to confirm this change.
chatbotWelcome: Greetings, traveler of consciousness. I am here to guide you. How can I assist you on your path today?
chatbotError: I'm sorry, I'm having trouble connecting right now. Please try again in a moment.
chatHistorySubtitle: Review past conversations between users and the AI guide.
allConversationsDescription: Click on a conversation to view the full chat history.
errorLogsSubtitle: Monitor and manage system errors reported automatically.
systemLogsDescription: List of all captured errors. Review them to maintain system health.
deleteLogConfirmDescription: This action is permanent. Are you sure you want to delete this error log?
logDetailsDescription: Detailed information about the captured error.
featureComingSoon: This feature is under development and will be available soon!

invitationSent: WhatsApp opened with the pre-filled message.

backupSubtitle: Manage your application's data. Be careful with these actions.
exportDataDescription: Download a JSON file with all the important data from your database (ceremonies, users, content, etc.).
importDataDescription: Import a previously exported JSON file. This will overwrite existing data.
importWarningDescription: This action will overwrite all existing data with the content of the file. A backup of the current state will be created automatically before proceeding.
importSuccessDescription: Your data has been restored from the backup file.
rollbackCardDescription: An automatic backup was created before the last import. You can restore it if something went wrong.
rollbackWarningDescription: This will restore the data to the state it was in before the last import. This action cannot be undone.
rollbackSuccessDescription: Data has been restored to its previous state.
analyticsDescription: See which sections of your site are most visited.
